_header: The star [stern] is risen of our redemption
_description: ?William Dunbar, On the Nativity, attributed to Dunbar — five 8-line stanzas with refrain: ‘The sterne is rissin of our redemptioun’

Banna.First Lines:
The sterne is rissin of our redemptiounIn baithlem with bemes blyth
                    and bricht…
Banna.Last Lines:
…In to þe hevin quhair þe Imperiall ringisThe stern
                    is rissin of our redemptioun
